title: Okminercom
author: Okminercom
created_time: July 09, 2023, 10:02:45 AMLast edit: October 27, 2023, 08:20:44 PM by Okminercom
content: Our team was established in 2017, dedicated to serving POW miners. We have developed firmware and cloud-based management for both ASIC and GPU miners (which can operate without a local proxy server). We offer mining pool services for eleven different coins and are currently developing wallet services. Most of iOS and Android mobile apps already support these services.Our mining pool successfully mines a diverse range of 11 cryptocurrencies - BTC, BCH, LTC, DODGE, ETC, RVN, ERG, CFX, KAS, ALPH, ZILCurrently, we serve over 4,000 users.Total hash rate: 610-650 P/HsFees: 2%, FPPS, PPS, and PPLN - https://okminer.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/15407261824788-OKMINER-pool-currency-and-ratesAutomatic payouts: Every day.The main interaction between clients and the pool takes place through our iOS mobile application - https://apps.apple.com/ru/app/okminer-os/id1494087547We also have a mobile application for Android - https://downap.okminer.com/hashapk/okminer.apkFor any pool-related inquiries, please contact our new Telegram channel for For English-language support - https://t.me/okminer_support. English support.In Chinese you can still get support on our old channel - https://t.me/okminer_CNIf you have any questions, feel free to ask them directly in the comments of this post.CONTACT INFO:Website: https://okminer.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100092744161694Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/okminer_pool/Discord: https://discord.gg/atTjmbT62JTwitter: @OkminerPooliOS App: https://apps.apple.com/ru/app/okminer-os/id1494087547Android App: https://downap.okminer.com/hashapk/okminer.apk

comments.author: Okminercom
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHFs on July 09, 2023, 10:08:16 AMBTC & BCH dual mining?Hi CryptoHFs. Previously, we used BTC/BCH/BSV multi-mining. Now we don't anymore. Only separately BTC and BCH. For now we are watching the market. If market conditions will be conducive to the return of dual BTC and BCH mining, then we will do it.Situation at the moment: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VgDKSZvmMS_eYt_TYUh4fvefB5JpNG3V/view?usp=drive_link

comments.body: Do you mean are we a Turkish company?

comments.author: Okminercom
comments.body: UPD: Large clients with a combined equipment hash rate of 250 PH/s and above can enjoy reduced FPPS rates, reaching as low as 0.8%. Join us for optimal efficiency and maximum returns. Welcome to OKMINER!
